name: Zaky’s Fast Mission
description:
This is Zaky’s very first arcade-style game, where you can hop on-board Zaky’s rocketship and join him on his fasting mission! Avoid all the food and drink that you see and collect as many good deeds you can along the way to increase your Emaan level. Shoot the food and drink to increase your score, and watch out for Shaytan who comes along to throw fire balls at you! Drop water bombs at him to get rid of him! This game is such great fun; however it’s also a fantastic way for your child to learn all about fasting and Ramadan.



Features six exciting levels, as well as information about fasting and Ramadan narrated by Zaky.



Look out for other fun and educational Zaky games, films and more by One 4 Kids.
